title: Bill Paxton
summary: William Paxton (May 17, 1955 â€“ February 25, 2017) was an American actor, filmmaker and musician. He appeared in films such as Weird Science (1985), Near Dark (1987), Aliens (1986), Tombstone (1993), True Lies (1994), Apollo 13 (1995), Twister (1996), and Titanic (1997).
